page.title: 13An Appealing Country Town
page.content: South Woodham Ferrers offers its inhabitants a small compact town with many new and attractive properties. New-comers enjoy the village atmosphere and the friendly community spirit. There are many recreational activites for both children and adults. Residents appreciate the peaceful surrounding countryside, the fresh air and the nearness to the river Crouch. There are many walkways and cycle ways for the townspeople to enjoy. Everything in South Woodham Ferrers is within walking distance and there is a good shopping centre which is easily assessible. There is also free parking for drivers. This is a young town, with very young families. The area is new and exciting and offers a challenge to its residents.
